name: EDDocumentationFields
title: ElementDefinition: short, definition, comment, requirements, alias

element.definition: A name associated with the patient. Must include at least family or given name.
element.comment: In this profile, at least one name is required for patient matching.
element.requirements: Need to be able to track the patient by name.

element.definition: The date of birth for the individual. Must be a complete date.
element.label: Birth Date
element.meaningWhenMissing: If birthDate is absent, the patient's age cannot be determined.
